decks.notes: This deck focuses on cycling through cards to set up a powerful combo with Living End, which allows you to return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. By using cards like Architects of Will and Street Wraith to cycle through your deck quickly, you can generate a massive advantage over your opponent and overwhelm them with a sudden surge of creatures. The deck also includes disruption cards like Force of Negation to protect your combo and maintain control of the game.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on fast-paced aggression and disruption. It includes low-cost creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Orcish Bowmasters to quickly put pressure on the opponent. The deck also features a suite of disruptive spells like Fatal Push, Lightning Bolt, and Thoughtseize to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, cards like Grief and Dauthi Voidwalker provide additional disruption and card advantage. The deck aims to win by overwhelming the opponent with early aggression while disrupting their plays to maintain control of the game.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying threats like Death's Shadow and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to pressure the opponent's life total. It utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Unholy Heat to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage through Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration. With the help of cards like Drown in the Loch and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to control the board and finish the game with aggressive plays. Jegantha, the Wellspring provides additional value and consistency to the deck's game plan as a companion.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and planeswalkers like Teferi to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The key card, The One Ring, helps to maintain card advantage and control the board by exiling cards from the opponent's graveyard. The mana base includes lands that provide flexibility and consistency, allowing the player to consistently cast their spells and maintain control of the game. The overall strategy revolves around outlasting the opponent through control and card advantage until victory is achieved.

This deck focuses on utilizing cards like Indomitable Creativity and Transmogrify to cheat out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty onto the battlefield early in the game. The deck also includes cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Persist to recur key creatures and generate value. The mana base includes fetch lands and shock lands to ensure consistency and flexibility in casting spells. Overall, the deck aims to be creative in its combos and interactions to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

Fast-paced aggressive deck focused on quickly dropping threats and disrupting opponent's game plan with countermagic. Utilizes efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dragon's Rage Channeler to pressure opponents, while also having removal spells like Unholy Heat and Lightning Bolt to deal with threats. Counterspells like Counterspell and Spell Pierce help protect your own creatures and disrupt opponent's plays. Card selection and manipulation through spells like Expressive Iteration and Preordain ensure a consistent draw. Murktide Regent provides a powerful finisher. Overall, the deck aims to win quickly by overwhelming opponents with early threats and disruption.
